description: Agendas and reports from the Rail and Underground panel from 2006 to 2016

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Before committees and panels were reorganised in 2016, the Rail \u0026 Underground panel considered wide-ranging issues including policy, strategy, the implementation of the Mayor's Transport Strategy and operating business performance in relation to TfL's Rail and Underground services."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
